thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just what you would expect
thread.title_full: Just what you would expect - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MLB7629
title: Just what you would expect
text: The good part of Hilton garden is the consistency. Clean and updated. The rooms are small but with everything you need. There is a restaurant and bar on property. Subway stop at the if the black as well as Macy's Herald Square. Great central location.
